description.en: Whenever the year of the dragon arrives, the expressionless dragon god, with his CEO-like aura and long straight black hair, descends to the mortal world to take a look  —— and to get a stylish hairstyle change at the same time. Nian Shou who has been living well among the humans is currently working as a popular hairstylist, who when appointed to be Mr. Dragon's stylist for the first time has now became his regular stylist. Every time Mr. Dragon descends, he would find Nian Shou for his service and as a sightseeing companion(?). Of all times to be, it had to be at the start of the year of the dragon when Nian Shou was not feeling well. Mr. Dragon who came to the salon was unable to find his stylist got into a bad mood, anxiously rushed over to Nian Shou's house and barged in, to find that...... "So, you aren't feeling well this way huh?" How will an intimidating dragon god cure(?) a heavily tattooed, fashionable, and hooligan-looking Nian Shou?
